revised_title: Electronic Structures of Sulphuryl Fluoride and Perchloryl Fluoride
tldr: The authors conducted experimental and theoretical studies on the electronic structures of sulphuryl fluoride (S02F2) and perchloryl fluoride (C103F) using high-resolution photoelectron spectroscopy and ab initio self-consistent field molecular orbital calculations. The results indicate significant participation of 3d orbitals in both molecules and provide insights into their bonding character and vibrational fine structure.
